item.title: OOP 2020
item.description: A field report from the 2020 OOP conference in Munich.

item.title: A Field Report From the O’Reilly Software Architecture in Berlin
item.description: Last week, we were at the O’Reilly Software Architecture in Berlin. In this article we share our key learnings and takeaways with you.

item.title: Software Circus
item.description: The most interesting topics we experienced during this year’s Software Circus include AI/ Machine Learning, Software Architecture, DevOps.
